markdownRemark.excerpt: Software development, as an industry, has often strugged with shipping quality code. It seems that many developers have a different metric for what quality…
markdownRemark.html:
Software development, as an industry, has often strugged with shipping quality code. It seems that many developers have a different metric for what quality means but often it’s a challenge to write code that lives up to that metric.

We build our computer systems the way we build our cities: over time, without a plan, and on top of ruins.

-Ellen Ullman

frontmatter.title: The magic of a mise en place mindset for frontend development
Windows Subsystem for Linux for JavaScript development
